Artisan Bread Making Workshops

Learn the ancient art of bread making using traditional techniques and our wood-fired oven. Create delicious sourdough using heritage grains and time-honored methods passed down through generations.

Traditional Process

Step 1: Sourdough Starter
Learn to create and maintain a living sourdough culture
Step 2: Ancient Grains
Work with heritage wheat varieties and local ingredients
Step 3: Hand Kneading
Master traditional techniques for dough development
Step 4: Wood-Fired Baking
Experience the unique flavors of wood-fired oven baking

All Skill Levels Welcome

• Complete beginners - learn fundamental techniques
• Home bakers - refine your sourdough skills
• Experienced bakers - master wood-fired techniques
• Professional development - traditional methods
